About Debt-Equity Swaps
What is a Debt-Equity Swap?

A debt-equity swap is a financial transaction where a company converts its debt obligations into equity ownership.

Benefits
  • Improves debt-to-equity ratio
  • Reduces interest payments
  • Enhances financial flexibility
  • May improve credit rating
Considerations
  • Dilutes existing shareholders
  • Changes ownership structure
  • May affect voting rights
  • Requires regulatory approval
